title: (x) reSearcher - House Chalet {Adriano E}
content:
I've gotten close but not spot on. Kabel has the right kind of e but the r doesn't match. Any ideas?   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128004636im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/39660.gif)   
   
Thanks a lot!   
   
Jon
author: Jon Whipple

comments.content: yep. House Industries Chalet NewYorkNineteenSeventy, except the S which is Chalet NewYorkNineteenSeventy.
